meanings.definition: A person or company that has exclusive control over a commodity or service.
meanings.sent1: The monopolist in our town owns all the gas stations.
meanings.sent2: The monopolist increased prices once they eliminated all competition.
meanings.sent3: The monopolist who controlled all the ice cream shops made sure everyone paid double!
meanings.sent4: She was a monopolist of kindness, spreading joy wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The monopolist of the playground, he decided who could use the swings.

meanings.sent1: The greedy monopolist hoarded all the toys for himself.
meanings.sent2: The monopolist of the office always took credit for others' ideas.
meanings.sent3: The monopolist of the cookie jar was caught with crumbs all over his face!
meanings.sent4: She was a monopolist of attention, always making sure she was the center of it.
meanings.sent5: The monopolist of the classroom, he never let anyone else answer questions.
